Description: Align a protein sequence against a genome with affine gap penalty, splicing and frameshift.
EDAM_topic: Sequence sites, features and motifs, Sequence analysis
EDAM_topic_(no_superclasses): Sequence sites, features and motifs, Sequence analysis
bio.tool_description: Miniprot aligns a protein sequence against a genome with affine gap penalty, splicing and frameshift. It is primarily intended for annotating protein-coding genes in a new species using known genes from other species.
